featured.text: Diapers are _(23)_ used by astronauts when they are outside the space shuttle, wearing a spacesuit.
_(22)_ problem urged NASA to develop the first space toilet, a modified diaper.

definition.zh_def: 用於包裹嬰兒或幼兒的尿布，通常是一次性或可重複使用的。
definition.en_def: A piece of absorbent material wrapped around a baby's bottom to absorb urine and feces.
definition.example: She changed the baby's diaper before putting him to bed.
